changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE data.department_sequence; CREATE TABLE data.department ( id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT NEXTVAL('data.department_sequence') PRIMARY KEY, created_at TIMESTAMP(6) WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, created_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_modified_at TIMESTAMP(6) WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, last_modified_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, version BIGINT NOT NULL, department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT uk_department_department_name UNIQUE );

rollback.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS data.department; DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS data.department_sequence;
